introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: QuakeSafe ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our earthquake monitoring and preparedness application.

automatic.title: Automatically Collected Information
items: Device type and operating system
Browser type and version
App usage statistics and preferences
Language and region settings
Time zone information

location.title: Location Information
location.content: We may request access to your approximate location to provide relevant earthquake data and emergency resources for your area. Location data is processed locally on your device and is not transmitted to our servers unless you explicitly choose to share it.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
items: To provide real-time earthquake monitoring and alerts
To display relevant safety guides and emergency resources
To customize the app experience based on your location and preferences
To improve app functionality and user experience
To enable offline functionality through service workers
To remember your settings and preferences

storage.title: Data Storage and Security
storage.content: We prioritize your privacy and data security:
items: Most data is stored locally on your device using browser storage (localStorage, IndexedDB)
We do not maintain user accounts or collect personally identifiable information
Earthquake data is fetched from public APIs (USGS, GeoNet, BMKG) in real-time
Your preferences and settings are stored only on your device
We use HTTPS encryption for all data transmission

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: QuakeSafe integrates with the following third-party services to provide earthquake data:
services: USGS (United States Geological Survey) - Global earthquake data
BMKG (Badan Meteorologi, Klimatologi, dan Geofisika) - Indonesia earthquake data
PHIVOLCS - Philippines earthquake and volcano data

rights.title: Your Rights and Choices
items: You can clear all locally stored data at any time through your browser settings
You can deny location access and still use most app features
You can change language and region preferences at any time
You can use the app offline without sharing any data
You can uninstall the PWA at any time to remove all local data

cookies.title: Cookies and Local Storage
cookies.content: We use browser local storage and service workers to enable offline functionality and remember your preferences. We do not use tracking cookies or third-party advertising cookies. You can clear this data at any time through your browser settings.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: QuakeSafe is designed for general audiences and does not knowingly collect information from children under 13. The app does not require registration or personal information from any users.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes by updating the 'Last Updated' date. Continued use of QuakeSafe after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us through the About page or visit our GitHub repository.
